arts.sum: Gustavo Lema, 56, became the first manager in 2025 to face the sack as the Pumas man was released of his duties after a year in charge of the club. Joining in April 2023, Lema spent the first eight months as the assistant manager to the current Toluca head coach, Antonio Mohamed, but was promoted in December of the same year for his first official managerial role.
